issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
I've just installed the mobileiron plugin. Now I am trying to establish a connection to our mdm. By enterering the register mobileiron target in the wizard the following error message appears:

*puglish target contains invalid values. Verifying the settings and try again.*

alias: default
host: mdm.xxx.com (tried with and without http://)
username: dlutz
fields.summary: Error when trying to establish a connection to MobileIron target

comments.body:
Hello,

Thanks for reaching out. Please follow the guide in here http://www.appcelerator.com/blog/2014/03/how-the-appcelerator-platform-integrates-with-mdmmam-and-what-the-future-holds/. Provide a valid alias, host, username, and passwprd. Watch the video for more clarity. 

Thanks.
